lead_paragraph: Brazilian great Pele said he was putting more than 2,000 items up for auction, including his three World Cup medals and a one-of-a-kind Jules Rimet trophy, in order to raise funds for charity and his former club Santos.

headline.print_headline: Pele to Donate Auction Money to Santos, Charity
headline.main: Pele to Donate Auction Money to Santos, Charity

snippet: Brazilian great Pele said he was putting more than 2,000 items up for auction, including his three World Cup medals and a one-of-a-kind Jules Rimet trophy, in order to raise funds for charity and his former club Santos....
